# The zlib extension

Configure the `zlib` extension.

This extension provides support for reading and writing gzip (.gz) compressed
files.

## EXT_ZLIB

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_ZLIB_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
